featured.text: Its worldwide popularity is mainly due to its theme music, which showcases ABBA’s timeless songs in a fresh and vital way 24 retains the essence of both pop music and good musical theater.

definition.zh_def: 展示，展覽，特別展示某物以引起注意或興趣。
definition.en_def: To display or exhibit something, especially to attract attention or interest.
definition.example: The artist will showcase her new paintings at the gallery this weekend.
